title: A briefe relation of that which hath been lately attempted to procure ecclesiastical peace amongst Protestants published by Samuel Hartlib.
author: Hartlib, Samuel, d. 1662.
publisher: Printed by I.R. for Andrew Crooke,
notes: An account of John Dury's mission to various countries to promote unity of Protestant churches.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
